About me

Hey There!

My name is Jelle. I am a software engineer living in Chicago. I am very passionate about my work and hobbies. That's why I created this little space to share some of them with you. Here you'll will find information about my work, education, projects and other random stuff.

Projects

These are some of my personal projects I use to play around with different technologies.

Iron Chain

IronChain is a motivational Android app based on the "don't break the chain" method.

Status: first tests

< / > view source code

Split It

Simple Android app written in JS with Cordova. It offers an easy way to split the check with your friends and calculate the exact amount payable per person based on what they ordered.

< / > view source code
